means: 不慌不忙地，从容不迫地

sentence.Network_en: He always speaks slowly and acts unhurriedly.
sentence.Network_cn: 他说话做事总是慢条斯理的.

sentence.Network_en: I composed myself, then walked on unhurriedly.
sentence.Network_cn: 我定了定神, 不慌不忙地向前走去.

sentence.Network_en: The bus stopped and started , picked people up, let them down, and pursued its interminable course again unhurriedly.
sentence.Network_cn: 公共汽车停停走走, 让人们上车下车, 然后不紧不慢地继续它那无休止的行程.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 慢_百度百科 ... 慢性子[ slowpoke] 慢悠悠[ unhurriedly] 同本义[ despise;look down on].
unhurried 不急的unhurriedly 不慌不忙地unhurt 未受伤

list.abs: Cars bumble unhurriedly over precision - trimmed granite cobblestones ., 汽车缓缓地在花岗岩和鹅卵石的路面上行驶.
They may walk unhurriedly on the street ., 他们就可以在马路上不慌不忙地走呀.
Lynn walked unhurriedly into the kitchen ., 林恩不慌不忙地走进了厨房.
to prepare adequately and to confront unhurriedly ., 充分准备从容面试.

means.word_mean: 不慌不忙地, 从容不迫地

sentences.en: The bus stopped and started, picked people up, let them down, and pursued its interminable course again unhurriedly.
sentences.cn: 公共汽车停停走走，让人们上车下车，然后不紧不慢地继续它那无休止的行程。
